articles.title: Meta, Amazon smash earnings expectations, as stock markets surge - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Asian markets rally after US tech giants post stronger-than-expected financial results.
articles.content:
Asian markets have rallied after the release of stronger-than-expected earnings results by Meta and Amazon sent the tech giants share prices surging.
